itemDisplayName: Blue-green Deployment to Virtual Machine ScaleSet with Jenkins
description: This template allows you to do blue-green deployment to the VMSS cluster with Jenkins. It provisions a Jenkins Master on a VM running on Azure; configures a DevOps pipeline to bake managed OS image with Tomcat 7 or 8 installed and deploy to VMSS. It is an example to demonstrate how we can use Jenkins pipeline to do blue-green deployment on VMSS.
summary: This template deploys two VMSS's under single Load Balancer, and uses Jenkins Pipeline to do blue-green deployment to the VMSS clusters.
